title: Build B2B Fiber/FTTH GGS infrastructure order cancellation coming from EOS during GIGA construction process
description:
Description
Process information:
FTTH Storno: https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Cancellation+Processes+FTTH
Requirement:
The running infrastructure order can be cancelled in EOS after having been sent to GGS:
EOS will cancel an infrastructure order which is already being processed by GIGA
EOS sends cancellation order to O3 [to be discussed with EOS]
O3 will create cancellation order
O3 cancellation order will be sent to GIGA
currently not planned in GIGA
currently to be discussed with GIGA
GIGA will process cancellation order
Link for Documentation in Wiki:
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/Infrastructure+Order+FTTH 
Target process (in progress):
  Useful Links:
